article_title: For the hundreds of thousands in northern Gaza, nowhere is safe - Red Crescent.
sentence: We've  been  focusing  on  Lebanon  for  the  past  few  hours  -  but  let's  turn  our  attention  back  to  Gaza,  where  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  Israeli  strikes  have  killed  65  people  in  the  past  24  hours.
